name: The Uncertain: VR Experience
description: The Uncertain: VR Experience is a VR-museum dedicated to our adventure series, The Uncertain. Our interactive gallery will be evolving with the release of every episode and it will always be completely free.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive
